document_data.name: Lock of Trickery
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lock of trickery''''' was a magical padlock.
document_data.Powers: A ''lock of trickery'' resembled and functioned like an ordinary [[lock (item)|lock]]. What made it unique was the magical tumbler inside it, which only a single [[key]] could unlock. This tumbler prevented a [[thief]] from [[lockpicks|picking]] the lock or using a duplicate key.
